msbt.message: I wanted to surprise you with a thing, so I bought you a thing and sent it to you because I wanted you to have it! Now you have the thing! I sent it to you! Enjoy it! It's your thing now! Yay!
A huh, that's a joke! "Old-timer"! Because "throwback" furniture. Ha! Thought of that, I dunno, three days ago? Anyway, I saw this and thought of you. And I also wanted to say the "old-timer" joke.
I bought this costume so I could play pretend! Buuut the bugs in the floor get freaked out every time I put it on. You seem like the kinda person that can play dress up without scaring a buncha bugs.

I saw this when I was out shopping. I thought it'd go on your body because they made it with holes for your body to fit through. I hope that your body fits inside of it. Do you like my surprise present?
But I have more than two shoes? And other types of things that go on my feet and legs! It's probably too much for me, so I'm sending some to you. I know you have feet AND legs. I've seen them!
Did you know that tea is so popular that they named a whole letter in the alphabet after it? Nothing else is that popular! Except maybe bees. Oh, and the sea. Anyway, I got U something 4 T time!
Do you like artsy stuff? 'Cause I found something real neat when I was cleaning. It made my brain think all kinds of weird thoughts just by staring at it! Isn't that cool? Now it's your turn!

I was looking for a piece of candy I dropped under my bed and found this. It's hard as a rock! I'm pretty sure it's not the candy I dropped. Unless it turns out to be a toffee bar...then it is and I want it back.
You know the way the sun goes away and everything gets real dark and boring? Well, how about if everything didn't need to get real dark and boring? Think about it!
I got a new snack bag in the mail so I'm sending you my old one. It's seen me through a lot of real hard candies so take good care of it. Also it's kinda sticky at the bottom so watch out for that.
